snippet: Nicolas Cage stars with Tye Sheridan in David Gordon Green’s “Joe,” a character study marking a departure from Mr. Cage’s recent action pictures.
abstract: Nicolas Cage stars with Tye Sheridan in David Gordon Green film Joe, notable character study that marks departure from actor's recent action pictures; role is more akin to Cage's earlier career, in which he starred in quirky comedies and thoughtful independent pictures.
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Cage stars with Tye Sheridan in David Gordon Green’s “Joe,” a character study marking a departure from Mr. Cage’s recent action pictures.

headline.seo: Nicolas Cage Returns to Indie Essentials With ‘Joe’
headline.main: Trading Flaming Skull for Inner Dad
headline.print_headline: Trading Flaming Skull for Inner Dad
